item.title: How self-awareness helped my career development
item.description: The fact that I’d end up working in tech came as no surprise to me nor to anyone who knew me. I’ve always been curious and enthusiastic about the infinite possibilities that a computer or video game presented. To create and learn is what moves me and, for sure, is what brought me here. However, I was definitely not ready for all the obstacles waiting for me in this journey.

item.title: 5 Soft Skills tips for Software Developers
item.description: Image Credits - Priscilla Du Preez on Unsplash As the Software Engineer role grows in popularity and everyone gets themselves into technical bootcamps, it’s also common to see companies saying that Soft Skills are also an important factor when considering a candidate for a position. But what are those, and why do people seem to have a hard time giving concrete examples? What are Soft Skills? According to the Collins English Dictionary, the term is defined as:
